THE OBJECTIVE FOR THIS AGREEMENT IS FOR THE RECIPIENT TO FIND AND HIRE A QUALIFIED ARCHITECTUAL AND ENGINEERING FIRM TO COMPLETE MULTIPLE PRELIMINARY INVESTIGATION AND FEASIBILITY REPORT (PIFR) AROUND THE STATE.  NRCS REQUIRES A PIFR AS ITS INITIAL STEP IN THE WATERSHED PLANNING PROCESS AND WILL UTILIZE THIS AGREEMENT TO ASSIST THOSE REQUESTING UNITS OF GOVERNMENT IN THE COMPLETION OF THAT DOCUMENT.

THE PURPOSE OF THIS AGREEMENT IS THE POOLING OF RESOURCES FOR INCREASED TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE FOR THE COASTAL WETLANDS PLANNING, PROTECTION AND RESTORATION ACT (CWPPRA) AND WILL RESULT IN CONSERVATION PRIORITIES BEING ADDRESSED IN A MORE EFFICIENT AND EFFECTIVE MANNER.
